Translations.Text: Ona implore GOD forgiveness. GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Nie argue on behalf z those zlo ich own souls; GOD nie laska any betrayer guilty
They zatajit ludia nie care zatajit GOD He je them mat rad they harbor idea He nemat rad! GOD JE fully aware z everything they ROBIT
Tu ty bol arguing ich behalf v this world argue GOD ich behalf Dni Vzkriesenie? Kto bol ich zastanca
Ktokolvek commits zly zlo jeho soul potom implores GOD forgiveness zalozit GOD Forgiving Merciful
Ktokolvek zarabat zhresit zarabat it detriment jeho own soul. GOD bol Omniscient Wise
Ktokolvek zarabat zhresit potom zalovat innocent clovek thereof committed blasphemy gross offense

If it je for GOD's grace ona Jeho zlutovanie some z them zmylit ona! They len zmylit they never harm ona v the maly GOD sent NADOL ONA scripture wisdom He taught ONA co ONA never ZAUZLIT! Indeed GOD's blessings ona bol velky
